name: The Unusual Ladder
description:
3D puzzle platformer in the literal sense. Instead of emphasizing movement the goal is to create a creative path to the keys using the resources you have been given. Collect all 6 keys to complete the game.

Controls:

WASD/ Arrow Keys to Move

Mouse Wheel to Change Camera POV

Space Bar to Jump

Left Mouse Click to Pick up Object

Escape to Close the Game
